metadata.name: Suspicious Diantz Download and Compress Into a CAB File
metadata.comment: Download and compress a remote file and store it in a cab file on local machine.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('diantz.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' \\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cab')))

output.summary: Download and compress a remote file and store it in a cab file on local machine.
